Postal address: Private Bag X31 Highveld Park 0169
Telephone: +27 (0) 12 661 0051

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Label: A
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: all ages category and means it is suitable for all.

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Label: PG
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: all ages category but cautious sensitive viewers and indicates that parents and caregivers are in the best position to decide whether or not a child in their care may view film or DVD for home entertainment purposes.

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Label: 7-9-PG
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: material in not suitable for children under the age of 7.

mdcr:Explanation.div: A parent or caregiver may decide if the material is appropriate for children their care from ages 7-9, if it is of particular entertainment or educational value for such children. Children from the ages of 7-9 years may not be allowed to watch a film classified 7-9 unless accompanied by an adult.

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: prohibited from distribution, exhibition, sale or hire to children under the age of 10 years

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Label: 10-12-PG
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: material in not suitable for children under the age of 10.

mdcr:Explanation.div: A parent or caregiver may decide if the material is appropriate for children to decide whether or not a child in their care from ages 10-12, if it is of particular entertainment or educational value for such children. Children from the ages of 10-12 years may not be allowed to watch a film classified 10-12 unless accompanied by an adult.

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: material is not suitable for children under the age of 13.
material is not suitable for children under the age of 16.
material is not suitable for children under the age of 18.

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Label: X18
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: Only a holder of a licence to conduct the business of adult premises, set out in section 24 of the Act, may distribute the film to persons older than eighteen or exhibit such content to such person within such premises.

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Label: XX
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: the material may not be distributed or exhibited in public by anyone and also not in the adult premises set out in the section 24 of the act.

mdcr:Explanation.div: In the case of child pornography it may also not be possessed anywhere.
content may not contain any scenes of substance abuse, direct or implied;
content may only contain low impact scenes of substance abuse if they are justified by the context or carry a suitable anti-substance abuse message
content may only contain low to mild impact occurrences of substance abuse. Any instances of moderate impact substance abuse must, contextually, carry a suitable anti-substance abuse message
content may only contain mild to moderate impact scenes of substance abuse. Any instances of moderate impact substance abuse must carry a suitable anti-substance abuse message
content may contain moderate instances of substance abuse. Any instances of strong impact substance abuse must, contextually, carry a suitable anti-substance abuse message
material may contain strong impact instances of substance abuse if justified by context.

Horror ‘H’ alters that there are occurrences of horror;(i)Any occurrences of horror of a mild, moderate, strong or very strong nature must be considered in the allocation of an appropriate age restriction.
content only contains low impact scenes of horror
content may contain scenes of low impact horror. Fantasy setting may, when appropriate, be regarded as reducing impact
content may contain scenes of mild to moderate impact horror
content may contain any scenes of moderate impact horror
content may contain scenes of strong impact horror
content may contain scenes of strong impact horror

Criminal Techniques ‘CT’(i)Criminal techniques and instructional details of illegal or dangerous acts that may be life-threatening and detailed enough to be re-enacted or self-instructional must be treated as a classifiable element to determine age restrictions. This may require a higher age restriction.
content may not contain any scenes of criminal techniques
content may not contain any scenes of criminal techniques

content may contain only mild to moderate impact violence. Verbal reference, but no visual presentation, of violence with no noticeable effect. If there are scenes of domestic violence, they must be justified within context, and the content must convey a strong message against it
content may not contain any instances of criminal techniques
content may contain moderate impact criminal techniques
content may contain scenes of strong impact criminal techniques

Imitative Acts and techniques ‘IAT’(i)Imitative acts and techniques’ is a classifiable element that determines age restrictions where there is a reasonable likelihood that such acts or techniques may be copied or imitated, especially by children.
content may contain scenes of low impact imitative acts and techniques
content may contain scenes of low impact imitative acts and techniques
content may contain instances of mild impact imitative acts and techniques
content may contain instances of mild impact imitative acts and techniques
content may contain instances of strong impact imitative acts and techniques
content may contain instances of very strong impact imitative acts and techniques

Language ‘L’ alerts that there is use of strong language;(i)The use of strong language must be considered in the allocation of an appropriate age restriction; and(ii)Regardless of the level of age restriction, the public must be alerted to the occurrence of strong language of a mild, moderate, strong or very strong impact.
content may only contain scenes with low impact language
content may only contain scenes with low to mild impact language
content may only contain instances of mild impact language
content may only contain instances of moderate impact language
content may contain instances of strong impact language
content may contain instances of very strong language

Nudity ‘N’warns that there are occurrences of nudity;(i) Nudity in natural non-sexual contexts, such as breast-feeding or bona fide cultural traditions, is not considered in the allocation of age-restrictions;(ii) The undue exposure of intimate parts must be considered in the allocation of an appropriate age restriction, based on the context and impact; and(iii) Regardless of the level of age restriction, the public must be alerted to the occurrence of nudity, sexual or nonsexual, of a mild, moderate, strong or very strong impact.
content may only contain scenes of low impact nudity in non-sexual contexts
content may contain scenes of low to mild impact nudity in non-sexual contexts
content may contain scenes of low impact nudity
content may contain scenes of mild impact nudity
content may contain scenes of moderate impact nudity;
content may contain scenes of strong impact nudity

Prejudice ‘P’ warns of occurrences or language that are biased or prejudiced with regard to race, ethnicity, gender, sex, pregnancy, marital status, ethnic or social origin, colour, sexual orientation, age, disability, religion, conscience, belief, culture, language; birth or other identifiable group characteristics;(i) Any occurrences or language of prejudice must be considered in the allocation of an appropriate age restriction; and(ii) The advocacy of hatred constituting incitement to cause harm, based on an identifiable group characteristic, must be refused classification.
content may not contain scenes or language of prejudice
content may contain scenes or language of prejudice of low impact, if it is clearly disapproved and used in an educational, dramatic or historical context
content may contain scenes or language of prejudice of low impact, if it is clearly disapproved and used in an educational,dramatic or historical context;
content may contain scenes or language of prejudice of mild impact, if it is clearly disapproved and used in an educational, dramatic or historical context
content may contain scenes or language of prejudice of moderate impact, if it is clearly disapproved and used in an educational, dramatic or historical context
content may contain scenes or language of prejudice of strong impact;

Sexually-related Activity ‘S’indicates occurrences involving sexually-related activity;(i) Any mild, moderate, strong or very strong impact occurrences of sexually-related activity, including consensual sexually-related activity, must be considered in the allocation of an appropriate age-restriction or distribution restriction; and(ii) Any occurrences of consensual explicit sexual conduct must be regarded as having a very strong or extreme impact, and must be classified appropriately.
content may not contain any scenes of actual, simulated or implied sexual conduct, but may contain scenes of affection
content may not contain any scenes of actual, simulated or implied sexual conduct, but may contain scenes of affection
content may contain scenes of low impact scenes of sexual conduct, but no scene of explicit sexual conduct. Verbal reference, but no visual presentation of sexual conduct with no noticeable effect

content may contain scenes of mild to moderate impact sexual conduct, whether actual, simulated or implied, but no scenes of explicit sexual conduct. Verbal reference, but no visual presentation, of sexual conduct with no noticeable effect

content may contain scenes of moderate impact or occasional strong impact sexual conduct, but no explicit sexual conduct. May contain brief details, close-ups or slow motion of sexual conduct. Verbal reference or visual presentation of sexual conduct may appear in the content which may have an impact
content may contain occurrences of strong or very strong sexual conduct, but no explicit sexual conduct. Verbal reference or visual presentation of sexual conduct;

Sexual Violence ‘SV’ indicates occurrences involving sexual violence;(i) Any occurrence of sexual violence must be considered in the allocation of an appropriate age restriction; a nd (ii) Any occurrences involving sexual violence, actual or implied, must be regarded as having a moderate, strong or every strong impact, and must be classified appropriately.
content may not contain any scenes of actual or implied sexual violence
content may not contain any scenes of actual or implied sexual violence
content may not contain any scenes of actual or implied sexual violence;
content may contain scenes of low impact, implied sexual violence
content may contain any scenes of actual sexual violence, but moderate sexual violence may be implied;
content may contain occurrences of actual moderate to strong sexual violence if justified by context but no explicit sexual violence;

Violence ‘V’ warns of violent occurrences;(i) Regardless of the level of age restriction, the public must be alerted to the occurrence of violence of a mild, moderate, strong or very strong impact; and(ii) Any occurrences of extreme violence must be regarded as having a strong or very strong impact, and must be classified appropriately.
content may contain only low impact violence, and may not contain any scenes of domestic violence
content may contain only low to mild impact violence. If there are scenes of domestic violence, they must be justified within context, and the content must convey a strong message against it;

content may contain only mild to moderate impact violence. Verbal reference, but no visual presentation, of violence with no noticeable effect. If there are scenes of domestic violence, they must be justified within context, and the content must convey a strong message against it

content may contain moderate impact violence. Verbal reference, but no visual presentation, of violence with no noticeable effect. If there are scenes of domestic violence, they must be justified within context, and the content must convey a strong message against it;

content may contain strong violence. May contain details, close-ups or slow motion of violence. Verbal reference or visual presentation of violence may appear in the content which may have an impact; and
content may contain strong to very strong violence. Verbal reference or visual presentation of violence
material may contain instances of blasphemy that do not amount to prejudice. Instances of blasphemy should be indicated as a matter of appropriate consumer information.

Competitive Intensity ‘CI’(i) The level of competitive intensity in a game, to the extent that it is linked to in-game violence, must be treated as a classifiable element to determine age restrictions; (ii) Higher levels of competitiveness in games involving violence may result in much higher aggression levels than in less competitive games involving violence, and are therefore a factor that must be considered in the determination of an age restriction; and(iii) Competitive intensity is heightened by the degree of interactivity of a game.
